value.message: Variable 'c' used as a filter parameter in listConversations; single-letter variable name is not descriptive.
Variable 'm' used as a filter parameter in listSAFeMeetings; single-letter variable name is not descriptive.
Resource access in getConversation(id: string) is controlled solely by the id parameter from the caller, without verifying ownership or authorization.
value.suggestion: Add backend authorization logic to verify that the requesting user/agent is authorized to access the conversation with the given id.

value.message: Resource listing in listConversations(agentId?: string) is filtered only by agentId, without verifying that the requesting user/agent is authorized to view these conversations.
value.suggestion: Implement backend authorization checks to ensure the requesting user/agent is permitted to view conversations for the specified agentId.
